notes.text: sap.m.ComboBox: prevent picker from closing during loadItems.
sap.m.MessageView: Sample adjustment
sap.m.Avatar: prevent event bubbling when LightBox is present
sap.m.ComboBox: Value state popup is now hidden when the picker is opened
We now trigger a fetch call to load PDF content and determine PDF availability in the PDFViewer
sap.m.StepInput: change validation behaviour of the StepInput when it has a binding model with Value State:
sap.m.StepInput: change validation behaviour of the StepInput when it has a binding model with Value State:"
sap.m.StepInput: change validation behaviour of the StepInput when it has a binding model with Value State:
xConfig: Reverts "Remove correct value"
We've now fixed an issue in FeedListItem where screen reader was not announcing the current item number and total count
sap.m.SplitContainer: Fixed box-shadow parameter
We've now fixed two ActionTile issues, one where the focus was consistently on the header link, and second where pressing the Enter key was not opening the right dialog box
sap.m.IconTabBar: Tooltips are now cloned to the select list
sap.m.DateTimeField: Update ValueStateHeader for mobile devices
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Bound icon is updated correctly
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Replacing the onmouseup event handler with ontap
sap.m.TimePicker: fixed Dialog title on mobile devices
sap.m.Toolbar: exclude disabled controls from Toolbar navigation
We've now resolved a loading issue for the vds file using the width configuration in the FilePreview dialog
We now ensure that the UploadSetWithTable plugin correctly handles file extraction while maintaining the original MIME type when you drag and drop files into the plugin
sap.m.SearchField: Fix Korean text display within OverflowToolbar
sap.m.Toolbar: KBH for nested sap.m.Tokenizer corrected
VariantManagement: Replace table MOM binding with cloned binding
sap.m.PlanningCalendarHeader: add visible label to the view switch
We now ensure that ItemRenameCanceled event is fired when the Rename dialog is closed by pressing the Esc key in UploadSetwithTable
We now ensure that the focus is set on the uploaded item when the renaming action is canceled in UploadSet
sap.m.ObjectStatus: state information is referenced in
sap.m.MultiInput: correct value after clonning
sap.m.RadioButton: focus outline is now correctly aligned with wrapping
sap.m.IllustrationPool: gracefully remove DOM pool assets
